# Tool Depth of Cut

> **Skill ID:** `prism-tool-depth`
> **Category:** TOOL
> **Version:** 2.0.0

## Description

Axial and radial depth limits

## Capabilities

- Calculate and validate tool depth of cut

## Usage

This skill provides expertise in tool depth of cut.

### When to Use

- When working with tool
- When needing tool depth of cut capabilities

## Dependencies

- `prism-tool-schema`

## Hooks

- `tool:depth:calculate`
